mapper.sql: code, p_name, m_code, p_ap, p_os, p_cpu, p_ram, p_capacity, p_battery
code, pc_name, m_code, pc_division, pc_os, pc_cpu, pc_ram, pc_capacity, pc_gpu
code, mo_name, m_code, mo_pannel, mo_Hz, mo_resolution, mo_speed, mo_shape
mapper.select: select ROWNUM, GUBUN, e.code, m_name as emp, name, cpu, os, ram, pannel, shape, m_code, ma_name as manufacture from equipmentView e left outer join member mem on mem.code = e.code left outer join manufacture ma on ma.ma_code = e.m_code where 1=1 and m_name like '%' || upper(#{m_name}) || '%' or m_name like '%' || lower(#{m_name}) || '%' and ma_name like '%' || upper(#{ma_name}) || '%' or ma_name like '%' || lower(#{ma_name}) || '%' and name like '%' || upper(#{name}) || '%' or name like '%' || lower(#{name}) || '%' and gubun like '%' || upper(#{gubun}) || '%' or gubun like '%' || lower(#{gubun}) || '%' and e.code = #{code}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM phone WHERE CODE = #{code} AND M_CODE = #{m_code}
DELETE FROM pc WHERE CODE = #{code} AND M_CODE = #{m_code}
DELETE FROM monitor WHERE CODE = #{code} AND M_CODE = #{m_code}
mapper.select: select code, m_name, m_depart from member
